name: 4th Edition of World Obesity and Weight Management Congress
content: Magnus Group, following the tremendous success of previous editions, is proud to announce the "4th Edition of World Obesity and Weight Management Congress" (WOC 2024) to be held in Baltimore, Maryland, USA from October 24 to 26, 2024\. This Obesity Events 2024 aims to bring together world-class experts, hailing from various countries, universities, laboratories, and industry sectors, onto a singular platform. Anticipating a diverse global audience, including distinguished speakers, academics, researchers, students, and laboratory professionals, the event will serve as an international forum where they can share their latest research findings and insights within the realm of Weight Management Conferences 2024\. The overarching theme for the conference will be " WEIGHT: Weighing Extraordinary Innovations and Gaining Honest Trends" fostering meaningful discussions and knowledge exchange. We are confident that this conference will offer a highly interactive and valuable platform for experts from both academic and industrial backgrounds to engage in face-to-face discussions and share their educational and research endeavors.
